name: dust bunny
notes:
simple top down stockinette cardigan with minimal shaping and relaxed fit. rolled stockinette collar and ribbed hem. light and airy. easy to wear and quick to whip up!

sizes: xs [s, m, l, xl] [2xl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl]
to fit bust 28-30 [32-34, 36-38, 40-42, 44-46] [48-50, 52-54, 56-58, 60-62] inches

yarn: 1 [1, 2, 2, 2] [3, 3, 4, 4] - skeins of hedgehog fibres alpaca boucle (66% alpaca and 34% silk, 100g/600m).

the colours pictured is a ‘potluck’ colour. potluck are our one of a kind colourways, but we dye them often! [check out what’s in stock here.][1]


  [1]: https://shop.hedgehogfibres.com/collections/yarn-alpaca-boucle
